document_data.name: Thauntar
document_data.mainbody: '''Thauntar''' was a warrior in the mid-13{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Appearance & Possessions: He wore mismatched armor, with a rusty gauntlet, and had only one eye.
document_data.History:
During a conversation with [[Elminster]] in {{yearlink|1262}},{{cite book/Elminster in Hell/Hardcover 2001|3|Realmslore}}{{cite web/Candlekeep Forum/Questions for Ed Greenwood (2009)/06-28 - Fools as Her Champions}}The date in the book is wrong due to editing error; see web cite he related unto Elminster that the Simbul, while deadly, was highly selective and only ever slew spies and killers from [[Thay]], rather than all mages, and that an embassy from a city in [[Chessenta]] was expected that evening.

During a conversation with [[Nergal (archdevil)|Nergal]] in {{yearlink|1372}}, Elminster related unto Nergal that Thauntar had died, but been loved by [[Mystra]] in life.
